Installation
============

This guide will walk you through the steps required to install Django.

System Requirements
-------------------

Before installing Django, ensure that your system meets the following requirements:

- Python (3.6 or higher) installed on your system.
- pip (Python package manager) installed.

Installing Django
------------------

You can install Django using pip. Open your terminal or command prompt and run the following command:

.. code-block:: shell

   pip install django

This command will download and install the latest version of Django and its dependencies.

Verifying the Installation
---------------------------

Once the installation is complete, you can verify that Django has been installed correctly by running the following command:

.. code-block:: shell

   python -m django --version

If Django has been installed successfully, you will see the version number printed on the screen.

Congratulations! You have successfully installed Django on your system. You're now ready to start building web applications with Django.

Next Steps
